parameters.command:
=#!/bin/bash
# 10. ë™ì˜ìƒ ì œì‘ - ì˜¤ë””ì˜¤ ì‹±í¬ ë²„ì „

TMP_DIR="{{ $('2. ë°ì´í„° ì¶”ì¶œ').first().json.tmpDir }}"

echo "=== ë™ì˜ìƒ ì œì‘ ì‹œì‘ ==="
echo "ğŸ“ tmpDir: $TMP_DIR"

# ë””ë ‰í† ë¦¬ í™•ì¸
if [ ! -d "$TMP_DIR" ]; then
    echo "âŒ ë””ë ‰í† ë¦¬ê°€ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: $TMP_DIR"
    exit 1
fi

cd "$TMP_DIR" || exit 1
echo "âœ… í˜„ì¬ ë””ë ‰í† ë¦¬: $(pwd)"
echo ""

# íŒŒì¼ í™•ì¸
echo "ğŸ“‹ íŒŒì¼ ëª©ë¡:"
ls -lh
echo ""

# concat.txt í™•ì¸
if [ ! -f "concat.txt" ]; then
    echo "âŒ concat.txt ì—†ìŒ!"
    exit 1
fi

echo "ğŸ“ concat.txt ë‚´ìš©:"
cat concat.txt
echo ""

# audio.mp3 í™•ì¸
if [ ! -f "audio.mp3" ]; then
    echo "âŒ audio.mp3 ì—†ìŒ!"
    exit 1
fi

# ì´ë¯¸ì§€ íŒŒì¼ í™•ì¸
IMAGE_COUNT=$(ls -1 scene_*.png 2>/dev/null | wc -l)
if [ "$IMAGE_COUNT" -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "âŒ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ íŒŒì¼ ì—†ìŒ!"
    exit 1
fi

echo "âœ… concat.txt: OK"
echo "âœ… audio.mp3: OK"
echo "âœ… ì´ë¯¸ì§€: ${IMAGE_COUNT}ê°œ"
echo ""

# ì˜¤ë””ì˜¤ ê¸¸ì´ í™•ì¸ (FFprobe ì‚¬ìš©)
AUDIO_DURATION=$(ffprobe -v error -show_entries format=duration -of default=noprint_wrappers=1:nokey=1 audio.mp3 2>/dev/null)
echo "ğŸ”Š ì˜¤ë””ì˜¤ ê¸¸ì´: ${AUDIO_DURATION}ì´ˆ"
echo ""

# FFmpeg ì‹¤í–‰ - ì¤‘ìš”: -shortest ì œê±°!
echo "ğŸ¬ FFmpeg ì‹¤í–‰ ì¤‘..."
ffmpeg -y -hide_banner \
  -f concat -safe 0 -i concat.txt \
  -i audio.mp3 \
  -vf "scale=1080:1920:force_original_aspect_ratio=decrease,pad=1080:1920:(ow-iw)/2:(oh-ih)/2:black,fps=30" \
  -c:v libx264 -preset medium -crf 23 \
  -c:a aac -b:a 192k \
  -pix_fmt yuv420p \
  -movflags +faststart \
  output.mp4

# âš ï¸ -shortest ì˜µì…˜ ì œê±°ë¨!
# ì´ì œ ì˜¤ë””ì˜¤ê°€ ëë‚  ë•Œê¹Œì§€ ì˜ìƒì´ ì¬ìƒë©ë‹ˆë‹¤.

# ê²°ê³¼ í™•ì¸
if [ -f "output.mp4" ]; then
    FILE_SIZE=$(ls -lh output.mp4 | awk '{print $5}')
    VIDEO_DURATION=$(ffprobe -v error -show_entries format=duration -of default=noprint_wrappers=1:nokey=1 output.mp4 2>/dev/null)
    echo ""
    echo "âœ… ë™ì˜ìƒ ìƒì„± ì™„ë£Œ!"
    echo "ğŸ“ íŒŒì¼: output.mp4"
    echo "ğŸ’¾ í¬ê¸°: $FILE_SIZE"
    echo "â±ï¸ ì˜ìƒ ê¸¸ì´: ${VIDEO_DURATION}ì´ˆ"
else
    echo "âŒ ë™ì˜ìƒ ìƒì„± ì‹¤íŒ¨!"
    exit 1
fi

=#!/bin/bash
# 9-2. Concat íŒŒì¼ ì €ì¥ (ìµœì¢… ì™„ë²½ ë²„ì „)

TMP_DIR="{{ $json.tmpDir }}"
CONCAT_FILE="${TMP_DIR}/concat.txt"

echo "=== Concat íŒŒì¼ ì €ì¥ ==="
echo "ğŸ“ tmpDir: $TMP_DIR"
echo "ğŸ“„ íŒŒì¼: $CONCAT_FILE"

# ë””ë ‰í† ë¦¬ í™•ì¸
if [ ! -d "$TMP_DIR" ]; then
    echo "âŒ ë””ë ‰í† ë¦¬ê°€ ì—†ìŠµë‹ˆë‹¤: $TMP_DIR"
    exit 1
fi

# echo -eë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•˜ì—¬ ì´ìŠ¤ì¼€ì´í”„ ì‹œí€€ìŠ¤ í•´ì„
echo -e '{{ $json.concatContent }}' > "$CONCAT_FILE"

# íŒŒì¼ ìƒì„± í™•ì¸
if [ ! -f "$CONCAT_FILE" ]; then
    echo "âŒ concat.txt ìƒì„± ì‹¤íŒ¨"
    exit 1
fi

echo "âœ… concat.txt ìƒì„± ì™„ë£Œ"
echo ""

# ìƒì„±ëœ íŒŒì¼ ë‚´ìš© í™•ì¸
echo "ğŸ“ concat.txt ë‚´ìš©:"
cat "$CONCAT_FILE"
echo ""

# ì¤„ë°”ê¿ˆ ì œëŒ€ë¡œ ë˜ì—ˆëŠ”ì§€ í™•ì¸
LINE_COUNT=$(wc -l < "$CONCAT_FILE")
echo "ğŸ“Š ì´ ì¤„ ìˆ˜: $LINE_COUNT"

# ì´ë¯¸ì§€ íŒŒì¼ í™•ì¸
IMAGE_COUNT=$(ls -1 "$TMP_DIR"/scene_*.png 2>/dev/null | wc -l)
echo "ğŸ–¼ï¸ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ íŒŒì¼: ${IMAGE_COUNT}ê°œ"

# ê° ì´ë¯¸ì§€ íŒŒì¼ ì¡´ì¬ ì—¬ë¶€ í™•ì¸
echo "ğŸ“‹ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ íŒŒì¼ ëª©ë¡:"
ls -1 "$TMP_DIR"/scene_*.png 2>/dev/null || echo "âŒ ì´ë¯¸ì§€ ì—†ìŒ"
echo ""

# ì˜¤ë””ì˜¤ íŒŒì¼ í™•ì¸
if [ -f "$TMP_DIR/audio.mp3" ]; then
    AUDIO_SIZE=$(ls -lh "$TMP_DIR/audio.mp3" | awk '{print $5}')
    echo "ğŸ”Š ì˜¤ë””ì˜¤: âœ… ($AUDIO_SIZE)"
else
    echo "ğŸ”Š ì˜¤ë””ì˜¤: âŒ ì—†ìŒ"
    exit 1
fi

echo ""
echo "âœ… ëª¨ë“  íŒŒì¼ ì¤€ë¹„ ì™„ë£Œ!"
